Pierre Bellemare (21 October 1929 – 26 May 2018) was a French novelist, radio personality, television presenter, producer, director, and actor. He was born in Boulogne-Billancourt, France. He was known for his role as Lesignac in the 2009 spy movie '. He also hosted "Crésus" for a short time from 2005 to 2006. From 2013 until his death, Bellemare hosted the radio program "Les pieds dans le plat" on Europe 1.
Bellemare died on 26 May 2018 in Suresnes, France at the age of 88.
